The Suck and Cut

The suck and cut!

It sucks and cuts. This device has an infinite array of uses. I prefer to mow the lawn with it. When turned on it uses the vacuum force of the fan to suck and chop!

The Construction of the Suck and cut consists of a section pvc pipe, heavy duty electrical wire and a 12 volt metal automotive radiator fan. Put all your ingredients together an the magic happens!

A multi generational DIY Series for educational use only.
